__e: Just beten us, I think I might be just a tiny bit jeous of your wife-to-be.
I mean, if that is your future wife out there, by all means, tell me to back off.
But I feel it's important that my future wife should think me so.
I know it's early, but you are a future Mrs. Eriksen.
Well... if it isn't the future Mrs. Allen.
All right, my treat future Mrs.--
And pay good attention to my future bride!
And no less on the day his future wife sits here waiting for him.
Seems like he's fixating on you. Like he sees you as his bride.
On this day, in generations to come, our people will remember you of the Z Nation, who fought with us here today.
It's good news for him, it's good news for future generations.
And she said " I want to make a record of this case for future generations and the world of science, and I want you to keep the camera very quiet."
You are in the presence of the future king of New York.
If you weren't the future king of France, and I was just a girl, not the queen of anything, would you want this?
I merely came to remind you what the next King of England gets:
Mock me all you want, but the people deserve to know what their future Queen is.
I can't blame you, I'm apparently no longer the future Queen of England and she does like anything with boys and... sometimes with girls.
What's a future queen to do when her king won't come to her?
